channel.title: Item on item
channel.description: can anyone give me a brief guide of how to do a item on item thing... Because Im making cooking in my server...

item.title: Item on item
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

			case 53:	// Use Item on another Item
                                        int usedWithSlot = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
					int itemUsedSlot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
                                        int unknown = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
					int unknown2 = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
                                        int useWith = playerItems[usedWithSlot]-1;
                                        int itemUsed = playerItems[itemUsedSlot]-1;

Here’s the using items on other items packet.
“useWith” is the variable used to represent the item that “itemUsed” is being used on.
So basically you just do this:

if(itemUsed == id && useWith == id)
{
//do stuff here
}

Read full topic
